Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: 'The moon once again hangs in the night sky. Wanshi helps Arnold open the pressure valve and return to the surface.'}
{3: 'Following the sound of a building collapsing in the distance, Arnold pats Wanshi on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm gonna be right back, Arnold.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Arnold merely nods in response. Wanshi checks his equipment, then sprints off into the distance.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{3: 'The clashing of metal on metal echoes throughout the empty city ruins.'}
{3: 'Blue, gold and black figures were entangled in battle. The sheer force of weapons colliding turns the surrounding gravel into dust.'}
{3: 'Chrome and Kamui try to distance themselves from the onslaught of close-ranged attacks from "Gear". However, they are only met with a barrage of bullets from its heavy machine gun.'}
{3: 'Following the barrage of bullets, "Gear" unleashes another flurry of close-ranged attacks.'}
{3: 'Chrome and Kamui grit their teeth as the enemy suppresses them with wave after wave of relentless attacks.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '...This bastard is on a whole other level.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But we can't be defeated this easily. Come on! Let's keep going!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Fools! Why can\'t you just embrace death and wait with us for the "Sage" to return?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Kamui and Chrome respond with a two-pronged attack. The greatsword and scythe slash in concertâ€”only to be caught firmly within "Gear\'s" grasp.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Gear?', 3: "Bwahaha! Babylonia couldn't have fallen this far, could they?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seizing the "Gear\'s" moment of arrogance, Kamui blocks its punch with his greatsword and follows it with a spinning slash from below.', 4: '1', 5: '3'}

{3: 'However, Kamui\'s greatsword is once again firmly blocked by "Gear"". Unable to respond in time, ""Gear" throws a punch straight at Kamui\'s face. The force of the blow sends Kamui flying into the side of a building.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome waves his scythe to distance himself from "Gear", then quickly retreats.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But his retreat route is immediately blocked off by a burst of black energy. The image of "Gear" gradually disappears as a devastating strike hurls straight toward Chrome.'}
{3: 'Before Chrome can react, "Gear" grabs him by the shoulders and pulls him into a forceful knee to the abdomen.'}

{3: 'Vital fluid spews from Chrome\'s mouth. But right at that moment, a huge rock flies toward "Gear". Extending its hand toward the approaching rock, it becomes a heavy machine gun that shreds the rock to pieces with a burst of gunfire.'}
{3: 'Shards of rock fall to the ground. However, Chrome disappears from in front of "Gear"". Looking into the distance, ""Gear" sees Kamui holding Chrome on the side of a building.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Are you okay...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I can still move. Don't worry about me, Captain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '(Chuckles)', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chrome smiles bitterly and wipes trace amounts of vital fluid from the corners of his mouth.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'My frame still needs to adjust to the adjustment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That thing can fight close range and at long distances. Looks like we've got ourselves a dilemma.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "We're up against a tough enemy, but that doesn't change our objective.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yeah, you're right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "We need to find that idiot we've been worried so much about, then finish the mission together.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Still holding onto unrealistic fantasies?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Another round of strafing forces Chrome and Kamui behind a section of the ruins.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A few seconds later, the ruins they are hiding behind are smashed to pieces. "Gear\'s" dark figure appears in front of Chrome and Kamui menacingly.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '3'}

{3: 'The sound of rapid bursts accompanied by sparks follow a series of blows exchanged between the three of them. A whirlwind of blows from "Gear" continues to press Chrome and Kamui, gradually tearing at their artificial skin.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Right as "Gear" blocks Chrome and Kamui\'s attempt at a counterattack, it declares victory against its defenseless opponents.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'But upon finishing this sentence, a silver flash appears above them and intercepts "Gear\'s" next attack.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Captain! Look!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Isn't it the person we've been worried sick.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gear?', 3: "Oh? Have you finally come out of hiding? I didn't think you'd still be operational after sustaining such heavy injuries.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Several silvery-white orbs of light descend from the sky, forcing "Gear" behind cover a few meters away.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The orbs of light splash on the surrounding ruins, stirring up a faint white mist.'}
{3: 'Enshrouded in the mist, the tired looks of Kamui and Chrome show faint signs of relief.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hehe, the cavalry's finally arrived.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi lands between the three figures. "Gear" prepares to take out its gun and shoot, only to be interrupted by Wanshi\'s grenade.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'When the grenade detonates, a large amount of mist and smoke fill the space.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{3: 'When the mist disappears, the Strike Hawk trio is already standing on a building far away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Getting here has been quite the pain in the...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Anyway, I made it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hehe, took you long enough.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "At least you're back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: "Hmph... Vermin will always be vermin regardless of how many there are. Do you three really think that'll change?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1801_2.jpg'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Captain, this mission is racking my overtime. I'm going to need some time off when I get back."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll consider it."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What about me, Captain?'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Will you be staying put in the base?'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hehe, fair enough.'}
{2: 'Gear?', 3: "How dare you assume you're getting out of here alive!"}
{3: '"Gear" shouts angrily as it shoots a barrage of bullets at the Strike Hawk trio. However, the bullets are deflected by Wanshi before they hit.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I don't care what you've done in the past."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'But now, you appear before me and threaten those I care.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "That means I've got you in my sights."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Looks like you need to start trying a little harder...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: 'Arnold leans against the ruins while the sphere bot projects the distant battle.'}
{3: 'A white, blue, and gold figure quickly move around the dark figure at the center.'}
{3: 'The dark figure, which had been suppressing the trio, was beginning to show signs of weakening. Now, the trio is continuing to force its retreat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: "Are they what's living on Earth now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'With a steel body like that, you could easily do so many things far beyond the abilities of us ordinary folks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "They continue to feel the emotional effects of battle. They feel confusion and pain, yet they continue movin' forward.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Never abandon your comrades. Never abandon hope...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "They ain't different from us humans. Hell, they're even more human than us in some regards.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory10.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: 'Are you sure you want to stay here all by yourself?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: 'If you come back, maybe the military can even provide you with shelter on my behalf.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "You know that ain't gonna happen, dumb***.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Get outta here. I don't wanna stain your perfect image. Consider us even.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I was a lone wolf durin' the Golden Age. I couldn't go back even if I wanted to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I've witnessed the glory and corruption of this era and the scourge of society spread throughout the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'The brilliant and wise elite rule at the top while everyone else struggles in the dregs of society. You and I both know the slums all too well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "That's why I've chosen to live the life of an outcast.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: "Who'd a thought an outcast like me'd end up with this newfound sense of conviction.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'I hated the polarized and fragmented human society that corroded the will of humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'I wanted to prove that era wrong. I tried my best to live isolated from the problems of the world around me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "But now, livin' has just turned into me lingerin' on and forcin' myself to survive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'The era I wanted to prove wrong has been washed away in the torrential current of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Humanity's time to shine is over. Now's the time to begin anew.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Constructs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Bahahaha! I guess ya'll are what humanity should be now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Earth... It really ain't worth all this damn nostalgia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'If we recapture Earth, then what? Rebuild the mistakes and madness of that past era?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "We're just souls unable to find solace in our inability to free ourselves from the shackles of gravity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'But if we leave the decisions to these Construct fellas, maybe we can end this vicious cycle and guide Earth down a new path...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory311.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Your attacks are futile!', 4: '1'}
{3: '"Gear" swings its fist to strike Kamui again but fails to anticipate him suddenly dodging the blow at the last second.'}
{3: 'Kamui sidesteps "Gear", revealing a barrage of bullets from Wanshi.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '"Gear" raises its other hand to deflect the bullets only to find that its entire body has been rendered motionless.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The faint blue projection of lightning dissipates. Chrome reaches out his hand for support against the wall and gasps for air.'}

{3: 'But at this moment, even though Chrome is vulnerable to an attack, "Gear" is unable to capitalize on the opportunity amidst a barrage of bullets aimed directly at its head. His only option is to fall back.'}
{3: 'Just as Chrome is about to collapse from overexerting himself, Kamui appears beside him and breaks his fall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: "I'll dispose of the weakest link first.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After being forced back, "Gear" turns to strike Chrome. Fortunately, the blow is firmly stopped by Kamui standing off to the side.'}
{3: 'The force of the blow pushes Kamui back several steps. His military boots leave deep gashes in the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I won't let you break through my defense.", 4: '2'}
{3: '"Gear" lifts its foot to kick Kamui, but right at that moment, Wanshi knocks it off balance with a volley of bullets.'}
{3: 'The Strike Hawk trio\'s unrelenting attacks continue to push "Gear" back through the streets and buildings.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'You must be joking! Even the "Chariot"...', 4: '1'}
{3: '"Gear" waves its arms and deflects a bullet. Right as it is about to shoot back, it feels a gust of wind above him.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui raises his greatsword and slashes downward from high above as "Gear" retreats. The devastating slash strikes the ground, sending debris flying into the air.'}
{3: '"Gear" shoulders the blow of debris, then reaches out to grab Kamui through the cloud of dust,'}
{3: 'But as "Gear" traverses the dust, it is met with a scythe imbued with lightning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "One cannot catch Saint Elmo's Fire barehanded.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Retreating a few steps, "Gear" manages to stabilize itself and catch the destructive impact of the scythe. Right as it tries to grab hold of Chrome...'}
{3: 'He is interrupted by a barrage of bullets from the side.'}
{3: '"Gear" tries to block the incoming barrage, but an ebony greatsword appears in front of it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Haha! Can't block this now, can you?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The greatsword slices through the lightning and bullets, straight for "Gear\'s"" head. Following a dull thud, the strike sends ""Gear" flying across the street and into a building.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: "Is that all you've got?", 4: '1'}

{3: 'After pushing off the stone slab that pinned it down, "Gear" slowly exits the building. A faint current envelopes it. The slash from the greatsword should have smashed its frame. Instead, it only leaves a faint scratch on its helmet.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Looks like we're back to where we started.", 4: '1'}
{3: '"Gear" looks around to discover that the trio have pushed it back to where Wanshi first made his retreat.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: "Hmph, it appears so. We're back to where you wretched dogs ran away with your tails between your legs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gear?', 3: "How sad. You'll lose here again soon, but you won't escape this time!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
